unpublishedAction.name: EligibleDriver

actionConfiguration.body:
select id from drivers {{ typeof(this.params.result_ids) != 'undefined' ? `where (geo_region_id = ${this.params.city_id} and vehicle_id = ${this.params.vehicle_id} ) and id = ANY('${ '{' + this.params.result_ids + '}' }') limit 5000;` : ' limit 0'

}}

jsonPathKeys: typeof(this.params.result_ids) != 'undefined' ? `where (geo_region_id = ${this.params.city_id} and vehicle_id = ${this.params.vehicle_id} ) and id = ANY('${ '{' + this.params.result_ids + '}' }') limit 5000;` : ' limit 0'
